# Divorce Wars: A Love Story

}}
Divorce Wars: A Love Story (also known simply as Divorce Wars) is a 1982 American made-for-television drama film written, directed and produced by Donald Wrye. It was originally broadcast March 1, 1982 on ABC.  It was the seventh most-watched show for the week of March 1â€“7, 1982.
